com.hazelcast.jet

Interface ICacheJet<K,V>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - the type of keys maintained by this cache
    V - the type of values
    All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, javax.cache.Cache<K,V>, Closeable, DistributedObject, ICache<K,V>, Iterable<javax.cache.Cache.Entry<K,V>>, PrefixedDistributedObject

    public interface ICacheJet<K,V>
extends ICache<K,V>
    A distributed, in-memory implementation of JCache specification.

    The entries of the cache are distributed across the whole cluster and partitioned by key.

    Main difference with IMapJet is that the API implements JCache specification rather than ConcurrentMap, otherwise both implementations have a lot of similarities.

    As with IMapJet, it's possible to use the cache as a data source or sink in a Jet Pipeline, using Sources.cache(String) or Sinks.cache(String) and the change stream of the cache can be read using Sources.cacheJournal(String, JournalInitialPosition).

    Since:
    3.0
    See Also:
    ICache, Sources.cache(String), Sources.cacheJournal(String, JournalInitialPosition), (String)
